item.title: Malcolm-Jamal Warner, Theo Huxtable on ‘The Cosby Show,’ Dead at 54 After Drowning
item.description: Mr. Warner, who played the only son of Bill Cosby’s character on the beloved 1980s sitcom, drowned in Costa Rica.

item.title: Mormon Tabernacle Choir Records Its 5,000th Show
item.description: “Music & the Spoken Word” has been on the air since 1929. Much has changed, yet much has remained exactly the same.
